advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
BestOf helps you become an instant expert on restaurants, entertainment, shopping and more in 32 cities.

Want to try the Best Bagel in New York, Best Cuban Restaurant in Miami, or Best Brunch in Dallas?  We have that!  Feel like trying out the Best Golf Course in Phoenix or Best Bowling in St. Louis?  We can point you to hundreds of local activities. And if you want to end your day at the Best Wine Bar in Denver or with a stop at the Best Vintage Store in Los Angeles, we have that, too.

The best time of your life is just around the corner.  BestOf can help you find it.

FEATURES
- Use the Winners section to find all BestOf winners and finalists near you, or search by category
- Find specific cuisines, entertainment and more in any city using the Search section
- Write your own quicktips and reviews for locations, and share via Facebook, Twitter, email or text message
- Bookmark your favorites to reference later, and access them by date, location name or distance
- Log in using Facebook, Google+, or create an account with BestOf.
- Vote for your favorites in seasonal Readers' Polls
- Always FREE

SUPPORTED CITIES:
Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Boston/Providence, Broward / Palm Beach, Chicago, Cleveland, Dallas / Ft. Worth, Denver, Detroit, Houston, Kansas City, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, Minneapolis / St. Paul, Nashville, New York, Orange County, Orlando, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, Raleigh / Durham, Sacramento, San Diego, San Francisco / Bay Area, Seattle, St. Louis, Tampa Bay / St. Petersburg, Washington DC
releaseNotes:
We've reworked the bookmarks. (Because you demanded it!) You can now bookmark without being logged in. If you do log in, we'll go ahead and store them for you so that you can view them on your other devices (and to keep them safe). Being logged in will also give you other options (like bookmark sorting and the ability to leave quicktips). It's pretty quick and painless, but .. hey, we thought we'd give you the choice.

We also cleaned up the activity feed (it was kind of messy) and updated it so that you can see the activity for whatever city you have selected. Want to see what they are doing in other places?   Go for it.

Speaking of cities, there's a new "Suggest a City..." link on the city selection screen. If your city isn't there, let us know. Who knows?  It may be next.

And last but not least, we fixed some random bugs that had been bothering us, because that's what we do.
